name: The Scaverkus Soundscape
description:
Wander around the world of Scaverkus!  Hear the sounds of its three seasons, see how the ecology changes with the radical climate shifts of this alien desert world and encounter its inhabitants.

Use WASD to walk and look around with the mouse.

Use the following keys to switch seasons: 

1 - Frost Season

2 - Middle Season

3 - Volcano Season

Press ESC to quit.

------

Note: Due to concerns about how audio is distorted by WebGL formatting, there is no WebGL.  You can view the project instead of play it here:

Here is a video version:

https://insculpo.itch.io/scaverkus-scoundscape
